name: Princess Miyumi and The Necro's Dungeon - Time Attack
name_original: Princess Miyumi and The Necro's Dungeon - Time Attack
description:
Note: This game is meant to be played after finishing Princess Miyumi and The Necro's Dungeon, which you can find on CloudzChow page. 

How well do you know Princess Miyumi and The Necro's Dungeon? This edition will put your knowledge of the game and your preparation skills to the test.

The goal is pretty straight forward: Prepare yourself in the setup area by picking a team and a difficulty, buy supplies, equip items, allocate stat points, head to the Necro's Dungeon to start the stopwatch, and defeat Rayner to stop it.

Will you become one of the fastest of the demon slayers?

This game features:

  • A preparation room, where you customize your characters and set up the game difficulty.
  • Two playable teams.
  • Four difficulty settings.
  • An option to toggle off the built-in stopwatch if you want to use yours.
  • A leaderboard in the Discord server of the game.
  • Unlockables. Clear a S Rank run with Team A and you'll get...

Changelog:

  • Ver. 0.8
    • Released game. Team B can only access C and B rank due to balancing issues with a single character.
